parameters.name: _maxPercentIncrease
parameters.message: Enter the maximum percent increase allowed in a single block. Must be in quadruple precision format

parameters.name: _maxPercentDecrease
parameters.message: Enter the maximum percent decrease allowed in a single block. Must be in quadruple precision format

parameters.name: _capInterval
parameters.message: Enter how often to increase the magnitude of the cap on the change in reserve in seconds

parameters.name: _alpha
parameters.message: Enter the geometric EMA constant. Must be in quadruple precision format
